title: 'The Daily Show' Investigates How Difficult It Is For Convict To Get A Job
text:
'The Daily Show' Investigates How Difficult It Is For Convict To Get A Job 
Published By: Digg.com - Today 
That little box that asks if you've ever been convicted of a crime on job applications? Even if your criminal past was years ago, it still v...
